import React, { Component } from 'react' class Edit extends Component { state = { username: '', name: '', age: null, gender: "", height: null, weight: null, goalCalorie: null, errors: '' } handleChange = (event) => { console.log(event.target.value) this.setState({ [event.target.name] : event.target.value }) } render() { return(
Edit Form
) } } export default Edit
